A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Numerous logical inconsistencie\, plotholes\, and ludicrous elements\, even for a space opera.
Muddled plotted and pacing.  Numerous sub-plots that go nowhere or have no bearing on the story.
Humor falls flat.
No significant surprises.  Most of the "surprises" are predictable or have no dramatic weight.  Some of the attempts at dramatic moments actually are quite comical.
Driver\, Hamill\, and Ridley do the best they can with what they are given.
